english.segment1: I've seen this too many times before. Lust gripping my heart and ripping it out. I've seen this all too many times. I need you here, with me
english.segment2: I know this, I fear this, I love this, I hate this. God help me, God heal me, I need a way out. And every time I close my eyes I start to pray "take me away". Do you even know my name. Do you even care how I feel inside?. This lust won't win again. Everything I am depends on it, help me (Jesus)
english.segment3: God please help me. I need saving.
